channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Big 3 Elections of 2025, With a Week-And-A-Half to Go
item.description: The most prominent elections that observers are focusing on in 2025 are New Jersey Governor, New York Mayor, and Virginia Governor. In Virginia, there are also two other statewide races in contention â€“ for Lt. Governor and for Attorney General.
